case.name: Baka zombie!
case.description: Sakura is a zombie wearing makeup!

case.name: Headless
case.description: Sakura really loses her head over this game.

case.name: Cumplay
case.description: If a male forfeits while Sakura is exposed, she'll suggest using his climax during her forfeit. This sets a marker.

case.name: Slick Start
case.description: If a male has completed their forfeit before Sakura, she'll ask the first male to have completed if she can use that player's ejaculate to get herself going.

case.name: Makeup and Displays
case.description: If playing w/ Mulan, Sakura will ask whose disguise was better.
